de.polygonal.gl.VectorRenderer

type
class
A fast vector rendering system using the FP10 drawing API. Supports among other things: lines, triangles, AABBs, quads, circles, arcs, wedges, cubic bézier curves.

Constructor

new()
parameters
cacheKiB The cache size in kibibytes. A cache size of 1024 KiB is suitable for caching ~130000 points in single precision. Default is 1 MiB.
poolSize Improves performance by pooling a total of poolSize Vector/GraphicsPath objects. Default is 0 (pooling disabled).

Instance Variables

aabb(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> Void

Draws an axis-aligned bounding box.

aabbCenExt2(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> e : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws an axis-aligned bounding box using the center c and half-width extents e.

aabbCenExt4(inline,null) : cx : Float -> cy : Float -> ex : Float -> ey : Float -> Void

Draws an axis-aligned bounding box centered at (cx,cy) and with half-width extents (ex,ey).

aabbMinMax2(inline,null) : min : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> max : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws an axis-aligned bounding box using a min-max representation.

aabbMinMax4(inline,null) : xmin : Float -> ymin : Float -> xmax : Float -> ymax : Float -> Void

Draws an axis-aligned bounding box spanning from (xmin,ymin) to (xmax,ymax).

applyLineStyle(inline,null) : Void -> Void

Applies the line style defined in the style property.
Example: 
	  var vr = new VectorRenderer();
	  vr.style.lineColor = 0xFF0000;
	  vr.style.lineThickness = 2;
	  vr.style.lineAlpha = 1.0;
	  vr.applyLineStyle();

arc4(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> angle0 : Float -> angle1 : Float -> r : Float -> ?resume : Bool -> Void

Draws a circle segment with center c, radius r, from angle0 to angle1.

arc5(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> angle0 : Float -> angle1 : Float -> r : Float -> ?resume : Bool -> Void

Draws a circle segment centered at (x,y), radius r, from angle0 to angle1.

arrowLine3(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> size : Float -> Void

Draws an arrow from a to b.

arrowLine5(inline,null) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> size : Float -> Void

Draws an arrow from (ax,ay) to (bx,by).

arrowRay4(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> d : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> mag : Float -> size : Float -> Void

Draws an arrow starting at p, pointing in the direction d and with a magnitude of mag.

arrowRay6(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> dx : Float -> dy : Float -> mag : Float -> size : Float -> Void

Draws an arrow starting at (x,y), pointing in the direction (dx,dy) and with a magnitude of mag.

bezier4(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> d : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> threshold : Float -> Void

Draws a cubic bézier curve defined by a, b, c and d. If threshold is zero or negative, the curve is approximated using only two line segments. If threshold is positive, the curve is subdivided until the threshold criteria is met.

bezier8(default,method) : x0 : Float -> y0 : Float -> x1 : Float -> y1 : Float -> x2 : Float -> y2 : Float -> x3 : Float -> y3 : Float -> ?threshold : Float -> Void

Draws a cubic bézier curve defined by a=(x0,y0), b=(x1,y1), c=(x2,y2) and d=(x3,y3).

box2(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> e : Float -> Void

Draws a square box with center c and half-width extents e.

box3(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> e : Float -> Void

Draws a square box with center (x,y) and half-width extents e.

circle(inline,null) : s : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.Sphere2 -> Void

Draws a circle.

circle2(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a circle with center c and radius r.

circle3(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a circle with center (x,y) and radius r.

clearStroke(inline,null) : Void -> Void

Wrapper for style.clearStroke(). The stroke is immediately cleared by calling applyLineStyle().

crossHair2(inline,null) : v : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a crosshair at position p and radius r.

crossHair3(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a crosshair at (x,y) and radius r.

crossSkewed2(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a skewed cross (x) at position p and radius r.

crossSkewed3(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a skewed cross (x) at (x,y) and radius r.

dashedLine2(default,method) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> ?dashSize : Float -> ?gapSize : Float -> Void

Draws a dashed line from a to b.

dashedLine4(default,method) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> ?dashSize : Float -> ?gapSize : Float -> Void

Draws a dashed line from a to b.

fillEnd(inline,null) : Void -> Void

Applies a one-color fill to the previous shapes drawn since the invocation of fillStart().

fillStart(inline,null) : Void -> Void

Defines a one-color fill that subsequent calls (to the drawing methods of the VectorRenderer) use when drawing.

flush(default,method) : graphics : flash.display.Graphics -> Void

Sends the accumulated data in one shot to the renderer, which in turn draws the data to the specified gl object. Passing null just clears the buffer without drawing anything.

free(default,method) : Void -> Void

Deallocates alchemy memory.

grid3(inline,null) : res : Float -> bounds : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> cap : Bool -> Void

Draws a grid into the area specified by bounds with a resolution of res.

grid6(inline,null) : res : Float -> xmin : Float -> ymin : Float -> xmax : Float -> ymax : Float -> cap : Bool -> Void

Draws a grid into the area specified from (xmin,ymin) to (xmax,ymax) with a resolution of res.

line2(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws a line segment from a to b.

line4(inline,null) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> Void

Draws a line segment from (ax,ay) to (bx,by).

lineTo(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws a line segment from the current position to p.

lineTo2(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> Void

Draws a line segment from the current position to (x,y).

moveTo(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Moves the 'pen' to p.

moveTo2(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> Void

Moves the 'pen' to (x,y).

obb(inline,null) : o : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.OBB2 -> Void

Draws an oriented bounding box.

obbCenExtAngle3(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> e : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws an oriented bounding box centered at c, with half-width extents e and angle r.

obbCenExtAngle5(inline,null) : cx : Float -> cy : Float -> ex : Float -> ey : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws an oriented bounding box centered at (cx,cy), with half-width extents (ex,ey) and angle r.

plane4(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.Plane2 -> bounds : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> normalLength : Float -> normalSize : Float -> Void

Draws a plane p clipped against bounds.

planeThroughPoint10(inline,null) : px : Float -> py : Float -> nx : Float -> ny : Float -> xmin : Float -> ymin : Float -> xmax : Float -> ymax : Float -> normalLength : Float -> normalSize : Float -> Void

planeThroughPoint5(inline,null) : p : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> n : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> bounds : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.AABB2 -> normalLength : Float -> normalSize : Float -> Void

poly(default,method) : poly : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.primitive.Poly2 -> ?close : Bool -> Void

Draws a poly.

polyLineScalar(default,method) : vertexList : Array<Float> -> ?close : Bool -> Void

Draws a polyline through the points specified in vertexList. Format: x0, y0, x1, y1, ... ,xN, yN

polyLineVector(default,method) : vertexList : Array<de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY> -> ?close : Bool -> Void

Draws a polyline through the points specified in vertexList.

quad4(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> d : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws a quad through the points a, b, c and d.

quad8(inline,null) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> cx : Float -> cy : Float -> dx : Float -> dy : Float -> Void

Draws a quad through the points (ax,ay), (bx,by), (cx,cy) and (dx,dy).

rect2(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> e : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws a rectangle with center c and half-width extents e.

rect4(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> ex : Float -> ey : Float -> Void

Draws a rectangle with center (x,y) and half-width extents e.

setFillColor(inline,null) : ?rgb : Int -> ?alpha : Float -> Void

Wrapper for style.setFillColor(). Defining a fill style has no effect until fillStart() is called.

setLineStyle(inline,null) : ?rgb : Int -> ?alpha : Float -> ?thickness : Float -> Void

Wrapper for style.setLineColor(). The style is immediately applied by calling applyLineStyle().

setWinding(inline,null) : x : flash.display.GraphicsPathWinding -> Void

Specifies the rule for filling the areas created by shape intersection/overlap. Default is flash.display.GraphicsPathWinding.NON_ZERO;

ssl3(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a swept-sphere line (SLL) from a to b with radius r

ssl5(inline,null) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a swept-sphere line (SLL) from (ax,ay) to (bx,by) with radius r

ssp(inline,null) : vertexList : Array<de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY> -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a swept-sphere polygon (SSP) through the points specified in vertexList and with radius r.

ssr3(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> e : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a swept-sphere rectangle (SSR) with center c, half-width extents e and radius r.

ssr5(inline,null) : cx : Float -> cy : Float -> ex : Float -> ey : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a swept-sphere rectangle (SSR) with center (cx,cy), half-width extents (ex,ey) and radius r.

style(default,null) : VectorStyle

tri3(inline,null) : a : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> b : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> Void

Draws a triangle through the points a, b and c.

tri6(inline,null) : ax : Float -> ay : Float -> bx : Float -> by : Float -> cx : Float -> cy : Float -> Void

Draws a triangle through the points (ax,ay), (bx,by) and (cx,cy).

wedge4(inline,null) : c : de.polygonal.motor2.geom.math.XY -> angle0 : Float -> angle1 : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a wedge with center c, radius r, from angle0 to angle1.

wedge5(inline,null) : x : Float -> y : Float -> angle0 : Float -> angle1 : Float -> r : Float -> Void

Draws a wedge with centered at (x,y), radius r, from angle0 to angle1.
